title: Ontime Payments Platform
description: Senior Software Engineer on a payments platform built with serverless architecture on AWS. Working across the full stack with .NET/C# services, NoSQL databases, and modern cloud infrastructure.

title: Maxwell Mysteries
description: A mystery and puzzle game where players solve clues and unravel stories. Built as an interactive web experience with engaging gameplay mechanics.

title: Director's Portfolio
description: A sleek portfolio site for a film director, showcasing their body of work with video reels, project breakdowns, and a clean visual layout.

title: Actor's Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio site from Ollie's previous career in acting, featuring headshots, showreel, and performance credits.

title: Task Glitch
description: A task management app with a playful twist. Organise your to-dos with a clean interface and quirky interactions.
